answerText: John Ashenden [or John Ashenden][10] Ashenden was created by this English author, best known for writing Of Human Bondage.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 15 | 6 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This character was inspired by its author's stint in a counterintelligence operation to crush an Indian-German alliance during World War I. For 10 points each: [10] Name this secret agent who takes advantage of Chandra Lai's relationship with Giulia Lazzari to arrest the former in a 1928 collection of linked stories. An unrelated character with his last name is the narrator of the novel Cakes and Ale.
